name: ENVI Shoes
tag_list: jessica-simpson-acadia, jessica-simpson-ains, jessica-simpson-amona, jessica-simpson-angie, jessica-simpson-angus, jessica-simpson-ashy, jessica-simpson-astor, jessica-simpson-bags-rock-n-roll, jessica-simpson-bag-decade, jessica-simpson-bag-dresscde, jes
overview:
Individuality, confidence, and style. You don’t find these things everywhere, but you sure as hell do find them in ENVI Shoes and, more importantly, in the people who wear them.

A small, tight-knit company based out of Baltimore, ENVI Shoes understands it’s small businesses and independent designers that really have their finger on the pulse of style. Knowing this, ENVI works with a selective handful of indie designers to bring you the most fashion-forward, unique styles that are on the market today.

ENVI Shoes boasts a wide varietiy of Sandals, Pumps, Wedges, Sling-back sandals, Boots, Platforms, Dress, Flats, Flip Flops, Moccasins, Slide, Thongs, Casual, Evening, Clogs/Mules, Comfort, Slippers, Satchels, Clutches/Wristlets, Hobos, Totes, Flap, Barrel, Cosmetic, Shopper Bags, Shoulder Bags, Brush Case Bags, Messenger Bags, Overnighter Bags, Dome Bags, Hand Held Bags, Wallets, Cross Body Bags, Top Zip Bags and Zip Around Bags.

ENVI Shoes carries brands including Apepazza, Ash, Frye, Gee WaWa Grace Hats, Jeffrey Campbell, Jessica Simpson, Matiko, Messeca, MTNG, Minnetonka, Osborn, SENSO, SixtySeven, Sam Edelman, Seychelles, Tano Bags, UGG Australia, United Nude and more.

ENVI Shoes constantly has new arrivals coming in, so check back to stay ahead of the fashion game!
